channel.title: (PI)webclient question
channel.description: so i was recently wondering were do you upload the jar file?cuz once i made a webclient but it didnt work so my question is do you upload it to your website like go to upload file on you website or just anywere?

item.title: (PI)webclient question
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

Woopzpkedu:

so i was recently wondering were do you upload the jar file?cuz once i made a webclient but it didnt work so my question is do you upload it to your website like go to upload file on you website or just anywere?

In your html code where it says client.jar or the part where it calls the jar file. You can add dropbox link into that part and it will work perfect

Below a example add jar link in “your client.jar link here”

[code]

YOUR CLIENT

NOTE:

YOUR SPECIAL NOTE HERE!!

Another note here…

[/code]

Read full topic
